Class com.chimu.form.FormPack 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----com.chimu.form.FormPack
public class FormPack
extends Object
FORM is a Framework for Object-Relational Mapping. The two root classes two FORM are the DatabaseConnection, which describes and connects to a particular database, and the Orm, which describes how to map your domain objects to that database.

See Also:
Orm, DatabaseConnection

Variable Index

o formVersion

Method Index

(s) main(String[])
FORM Version, Copyright and Warranties.
(s) newDatabaseConnection(Connection)
Create a databaseConnection and determine the database type by querying the database itself.
(s) newDatabaseConnection_delayDoneSetup(Connection)
Create a databaseConnection and but delay completing the setup until called explicitly later.
(s) newOrm()
Create a new root object mapper
